line.text: When I consider every thing that grows
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Holds in perfection but a little moment
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: That this huge stage presenteth nought but shows
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Whereon the stars in secret influence comment
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: When I perceive that men as plants increase
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Cheered and checked even by the self-same sky
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Vaunt in their youthful sap at height decrease
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And wear their brave state out of memory
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Then the conceit of this inconstant stay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Sets you most rich in youth before my sight
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: Where wasteful time debateth with decay
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: To change your day of youth to sullied night
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: And all in war with Time for love of you
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*

line.text: As he takes from you I engraft you new
line.meter: s s* s s* s s* s s* s s*
